definitions.definition: ( originally US ) The result of multiple things being combined together; a blend . [from late 20th c.]

main_definition: ( originally US ) The result of multiple things being combined together; a blend . [from late 20th c.]

definitions.definition: Especially in games of the rummy family : a combination of playing cards which is announced or played to score points .

main_definition: ( card games ) Especially in games of the rummy family : a combination of playing cards which is announced or played to score points . [from late 19th c.]
